name: Riftbound
storyline: Peace reigns in the enchanted realm until the nefarious Necromancer. One also doomed to spend eternity in the Dark Rift. He then breaks free of his otherworldly prison and threatens to spread his malicious influence across the land. Only a young spellcaster, with the counsel of the Great Oak and help of powerful elementals, can restore harmony. While banishing the magical menace once and for all.
summary: Call on the elements and evolve mighty creatures as you unleash an arsenal of spells to defend against waves of enemies, all on your epic journey to seal the rift and crush the undead invaders. Choose your spells & upgrades - it's time to go elemental!
